relevant_findings.description: Document details personnel transfer and cover employment information for Joseph S. Piccolo
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Mr. Piccolo's forwarding address will be 1636 N.E. 20th Street, Ft. Lauderdale, Florida. His new employment is 121st Tactical Fighter Sq., Andrews AFB.
relevant_findings.significance: Shows internal CIA personnel movement and cover employment practices, potentially indicating methods used for covert operations

relevant_findings.description: CIA document describing an employee's cover and employment history
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Mr. Piccolo entered on duty with the Agency on 4 February 1957 and will resign on 4 October 1961. During his period of employment he utilized [nominal] cover status
relevant_findings.significance: Reveals CIA's use of cover assignments and personnel management techniques during late 1950s/early 1960s
